</section>			<section
		id="description"
		class="content-feeder"
		data-dojo-type="escapio/components/base/ContentFeeder"
		data-dojo-props="step:0"
		itemprop="description"
		data-dojo-mixins="escapio/components/event-tracker/ContentFeederTrackerMixin"
		data-box="Beschreibung"
	>
		<header><h1>Hotel description</h1></header>
					<section class="item ">
								<div>In the heart of Munich, located right by the central train station, you will find the Wilhelminian building that houses the luxury hotel Sofitel Munich Bayerpost. Housed by the former royal Bavarian main post office, this 5 star hotel in Bavaria is full of creative design, modern comfort and urban flair!</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item ">
									<header>Urban Design in Munich</header>
								<div>The huge stylish lobby of the Sofitel Munich Bayerpost will give you a first taste of the chic interior design of the luxury hotel. All in all 396 functionally designed rooms at the design hotel in Munich offer, along with an unforgettable view stretching over the city center to the Alps, charming lighting schemes, exquisite glass baths, clever room dividers and fantastically comfortable beds.</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Cuisine at the 5 Star Hotel</header>
								<div>The three chic restaurants at the Sofitel Munich Bayerpost offer excellent service and typical Bavarian lifestyle. In the modern restaurant Schwarz & Weiz, guests can enjoy Alpine cuisine in purist design. The Brasserie "DÉLICE - La Brasserie" especially serves French brasserie cuisine and the glamorous Isar-Bar offers cocktails with a fabulous view of Munich through the large panorama window – the perfect way to let the day come to an end!</div>
			</section>
					<section class="item hidden-xs">
									<header>Business and Spa Hotel in Munich</header>
								<div>The Sofitel Munich Bayerpost in Munich is a great destination for business travelers. 20 top modern, bright conference rooms and the largest column free hall in the city centre of Munich with room for up to 800 guests and a hydraulic stage offer a fantastic ambience for business meetings and gala dinners in Munich. The futuristic „So SPA“ of the spa hotel can be accessed with an elevator from each hall. Here you can treat yourself to a massage, or relax in the sauna, tanning bed or heated pool after a long day of work or sightseeing.</div>
			</section>
			</section>
		<section class="send-to-email">
	<div class="icon-paper-plane"></div>
	<header>
		<h2>Forward this hotel</h2>
		<p>Like this hotel? Or want to recommend it to a friend? Simply forward it by email.</p>
	</header>
</section>

	// Check that google remarketing code was loaded (this can be blocked by add-on or in private mode)
	if (window.google_trackConversion) {
		require(['escapio/components/hotel/PriceController', 'escapio/components/session/travel_period', 'dojo/date/locale'], function(PriceController, travel_period, date_locale) {
			var track = function(price) {
				var params = {
					google_conversion_id: 1016934296,
					google_custom_params: {
						hrental_id: window.escapio.data.hotel.id,
						hrental_pagetype: 'offerdetail',
						hrental_startdate: date_locale.format(travel_period.getArrivalDate(), { datePattern: "yyyy-MM-dd", selector: "date"}),
						hrental_enddate: date_locale.format(travel_period.getDepartureDate(), { datePattern: "yyyy-MM-dd", selector: "date"})
					},
					google_remarketing_only: true
				};
				if (price) {
					params.google_custom_params.hrental_totalvalue = price;
				}
				window.google_trackConversion(params);
			};

			var getPriceFromResponse = function(response) {
				var price = undefined;
				for (var i=0; i<response.offers.length; i++) {
					if (price === undefined || price > response.offers[i].total_rate) {
						price = response.offers[i].total_rate;
					}
				}
				return price;
			};

			var controller = PriceController.getInstance();
			controller.on('load', function(response) {
				track(getPriceFromResponse(response));
			});
			controller.on('error', function() {
				track();
			});

			var response = controller.getLastResponse();
			if (response) {
				track(getPriceFromResponse(response));
			}
		});
	}
/* ]]> */
</script><!-- /google-remarketing --><!-- facebook --><script>
	!function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function()
	{n.callMethod? n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)}

	;if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
	n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
	t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
	document,'script','//connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');

	fbq('init', '618502034916953');
	fbq('track', "PageView");

	if (window.escapio.data.hotel.uploaded_to_facebook) {
		// hotel is already part of facebook product catalog, so we can track
		require(
			[
				'escapio/components/hotel/PriceController',
				'escapio/components/session/travel_period',
				'escapio/components/session/Guests',
				'escapio/components/session/currency',
				'dojo/_base/lang',
				'dojo/date/locale'
			],
			function(PriceController, travel_period, Guests, currency, lang, date_locale) {
				try {
					var controller = PriceController.getInstance();
					controller.on('load', function (response) {
						track(getPrice(response));
					});
					controller.on('error', function () {
						track();
					});

					var getPrice = function (response) {
						if (response && response.offers) {
							return response.offers.find(function (offer) {
								return offer.total_rate
							});
						}
					};

					var track = function (price) {
						var params = {
							content_type: 'hotel',
							content_ids: window.escapio.data.hotel.id,
							checkin_date: date_locale.format(travel_period.getArrivalDate(), {
								datePattern: "yyyy-MM-dd",
								selector: "date"
							}),
							checkout_date: date_locale.format(travel_period.getDepartureDate(), {
								datePattern: "yyyy-MM-dd",
								selector: "date"
							}),
							city: escapio.data.hotel.city_name,
							region: escapio.data.hotel.region_name,
							country: escapio.data.hotel.country_name,
							num_adults: Guests.getNumAdults(),
							num_children: Guests.getNumChildren()
						};

						if (price) {
							lang.mixin(params, {
								value: price.total_rate,
								currency: currency.get()
							});
						}

						return fbq('track', 'ViewContent', params);
					}
				} catch (exeption) {
					console.log(exeption);
				}
			}
		);
	}
	</script> <noscript><img height="1" width="1" style="display:none" src="https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=618502034916953&ev=PageView&noscript=1" /></noscript><!-- /facebook --><!-- outbrain --><script data-obct type="text/javascript">

content: pool, spa area, restaurant Hotel Type: Spa, 5 star, Boutique, Design, Luxury Hotel size (number of rooms): 396 Check-in: 15:00 | Check-out: 12:00 26 wheelchair access concierge elevator wireless LAN air conditioning night porter parking valet service, garage / covered parking terrace laundry service bar restaurant reception 24 hour room service airport shuttle tour and excursion bookings events service room service sewing / ironing service safe free Bayerstrasse 12 80335 Munich Bavaria, Germany Map motorway 12 km (A9, A8, A99, A94, A96, A92) train station 0,1 km (Hauptbahnhof) airport 45 km (Franz Josef Strauss) public transport stop 0,1 km (Sbahn ( Hauptbahnhof)) trade fair center 10 km (Riem) nearest city 170 km (Nuernberg) nightlife district 1 km (Unterschiedle Distrikte ( Sahwabin, Bogenhausen, Heidhausen...)) mountains 45 km (Alpenvorland) shopping 0,5 km (Innenstadt ) golf course 20 km (Eichenried ) tourist sights 3 km (National Museum, Pinakothek) In the heart of Munich, located right by the central train station, you will find the Wilhelminian building that houses the luxury hotel Sofitel Munich Bayerpost. Housed by the former royal Bavarian main post office, this 5 star hotel in Bavaria is full of creative design, modern comfort and urban flair! The huge stylish lobby of the Sofitel Munich Bayerpost will give you a first taste of the chic interior design of the luxury hotel. All in all 396 functionally designed rooms at the design hotel in Munich offer, along with an unforgettable view stretching over the city center to the Alps, charming lighting schemes, exquisite glass baths, clever room dividers and fantastically comfortable beds. The three chic restaurants at the Sofitel Munich Bayerpost offer excellent service and typical Bavarian lifestyle. In the modern restaurant Schwarz & Weiz, guests can enjoy Alpine cuisine in purist design. The Brasserie "DÉLICE - La Brasserie" especially serves French brasserie cuisine and the glamorous Isar-Bar offers cocktails with a fabulous view of Munich through the large panorama window – the perfect way to let the day come to an end! The Sofitel Munich Bayerpost in Munich is a great destination for business travelers. 20 top modern, bright conference rooms and the largest column free hall in the city centre of Munich with room for up to 800 guests and a hydraulic stage offer a fantastic ambience for business meetings and gala dinners in Munich. The futuristic „So SPA“ of the spa hotel can be accessed with an elevator from each hall. Here you can treat yourself to a massage, or relax in the sauna, tanning bed or heated pool after a long day of work or sightseeing. Send Mandarin Oriental Munich Munich, Germany Hotel München Palace Munich, Germany The Rilano Hotel München Munich, Germany Hotel la Maison Munich, Germany Bayerischer Hof Munich, Germany BOLD Hotel Munich, Germany The Flushing Meadows Hotel Munich, Germany H'Otello B'01 Munich, Germany Eurostars Grand Central Munich, Germany Sheraton München Westpark Hotel Munich, Germany 6 5 Star Hotels Munich 15 Boutique Hotels Munich 31 City Hotels Munich 19 Design Hotels Munich 8 Luxury Hotels Munich 13 Pet friendly Hotels Munich 11 Spa Hotels Munich
digest: Sofitel Munich Bayerpost: Luxury hotel in the heart of Munich with excellent restaurant & spa ✓ Price comparison: your dream hotel at the best price !
title: Sofitel Munich Bayerpost, Bavaria, Germany | Escapio.com
